description: Number of even graphical partitions of order 2n - number of odd partitions.
references: R. A. Brualdi, H. J. Ryser, Combinatorial Matrix Theory, Cambridge Univ. Press, 1992.
links: Index entries for sequences related to graphical partitions
formula: Calculated using Cor. 6.3.3, Th. 6.3.6, Cor. 6.2.5 of Brualdi-Ryser.
author: TORSTEN.SILLKE(AT)LHSYSTEMS.COM
